products.name: Modular Robot Arm
products.description: 3D-printable robot arm kit with 6 degrees of freedom. Includes control board and software.

products.name: 3D Printed Lamps
products.description: Functional and aesthetic 3D-printed lamps designed for home and office use. Custom designs with modern aesthetics.

products.name: Keychains & Accessories
products.description: Custom 3D-printed keychains, phone stands, and other everyday accessories. Simple prints, great designs.

products.name: Autonomous Rover Kit
products.description: Wheeled robot platform for exploring autonomous navigation and SLAM algorithms.

products.name: Robotic Hand
products.description: 5-finger robotic hand with fine motor control, designed for manipulation tasks.

products.name: 3D Printer Parts
products.description: High-quality replacement parts and upgrades for common 3D printers.

products.name: Top-Down Unreal Game
products.description: Top-down game in development using Unreal Engine. Exploring interactive gameplay, mechanics, and engaging player experiences.

products.name: Humanoid Robot
products.description: Full humanoid platform with bipedal locomotion and upper body manipulation.

products.name: ML Training Kit
products.description: Educational kit for training and deploying machine learning models on embedded hardware.

description: Our product range includes 3D-printed items like lamps and keychains, robot kits for learning, full robotic systems, and games developed in Unreal Engine.
